message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the cash flow statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In accounting terms, this is known as depreciation. Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section.

The value associated with the "Depreciation" line item is 132,103.78 as of 2024-02-01.

Therefore, the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is represented by the "Depreciation" line item with a value of 132,103.78.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '132103.78'}}
```
